column5: Here's a pic of my catch from last night, sorry for the quality, my buddy  E-mailed it to me, I did my best to try and sharpen and lighten it ,  In my left hand I'm holding about 22lbs of fish in the other about 8 lbs of fish, all caught on a 6" perch Suick , I left the boat at home and fished from shore right below the dam in downtown Sturgeon Falls, the bite started at 9:30 or so. We divided the catch , so we were legal for slot sizes. Fishfry for supper tonight!!
Good catch! Don't they have OFC hats in Sturg.?
Tookie said he'd get me one but never did,   I 'll corner T.J  when i see him.. I want a Hat   & a sticker bor the boat
You'll need two stickers unless you have a one-sided boat.
nice catch, where heading out tonight jigging for some after supper,im hoping for a stringer like that,where you fishing in that heavy rain
You also need a better camera. Horrible PQ. !
Yep!  fishin in that heavy wind and rain.. for the camera  I have a really good one .the pic is taken from my buddy's cell phone he e-mailed it to me this morning .  I did what i could with it.
Dammitt... im gonna have to get a new guide!!

Holy crap!! Who needs a guide when you can catch walleye, umm sorry Pickeral in our back yard like that TJ .  Awesome job Randy!!    and who would of thought anyone could catch Pickeral from shore other than "ccmtcanada"   Especially tossin a topwater suick. Jood job dude
Good Lord, from Shore! Whodda thunk it?
Great fishing, I only worry now you'll have a hard time getting back there, the crowds will be enormous. I made the mistake of telling a good pickerel hole once.
I did'nt divulge the exact spot , just the general area .. I went to have a look see last night , there were 3 people there but nobody in my spot.!!!
